name: blackfish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of various types of dark-coloured fish: Restaurant August serves Parmesan-crusted blackfish accompanied by lobster, mashed potatoes, and bouillabaisse jus. This year we caught some great blackfish - not big numbers, but four to eight fish per angler.
More examplesFewer examplesWe've had enjoyable times this month catching blackfish in the river.He was a great fisherman and used to try for blackfish - a really sweet white-fleshed creature.You'll need 4 blackfish portions, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp caster sugar, and 1 tbsp rice wine.
